metadata.title: CVE-2015-8235 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in Spiffy before 5.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8235` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chicken-bin - 4.12.0-0.3
libchicken8 - 4.12.0-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chicken package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.12.0-0.3').
